properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 4 at 3:40AM EST until January 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...Accumulating Snowfall Expected Today and Tonight Across the
East Tennessee Mountains...

.Cold air moving in from the northwest behind an arctic cold
front will combine with moisture to support a change over from
rain to snow from around midday today through early Sunday
morning. Advisory level snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches
are possible across the east Tennessee mountains, mainly above
3000 feet elevation.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee.

* WHEN...From noon today to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
